title: URF!!!!!
body: when will the urf mode coming?

replies.body: We'll have ARURF for the next two weekends on the Rotating Game Mode Queue. As for "standard" URF, I imagine we wont see that for a while, if ever. It would probably only return as some kind of "April Fools" event (or something similar) as a homage to what URF used to be.
